escapeLDAPSearchStringValue

public static java.lang.Object escapeLDAPSearchStringValue(java.lang.Object val)
Escape the given value to be used in a search string according to RFC 2254 escaping rules.

Parameters:
val - The value to escape.
Returns:
An RFC 2254 escaped version of the given value if it is a String, or just the given value if it is not a String.
